name: Orbit (itch) (Boat_Killer)
description:
Orbit is a game where... you orbit !

In Orbit, you're a comet and you really want to discover what hides behind this mysterious finish, so you'll try to use the gravitational field of stars and blackholes to get the best trajectory.

Controls :

  • Left click to launch your comet
  • Space to activate thrusters
  • E to reset your comet
  • R to reset the level
  • W to show trajectory prediction
  • M to open the menu

This game was made for the "Black and White Jam №∞+1" by MYline media using the Olc Pixel Game Engine.
